title: Anti-corrosive electrolyte design for extending the calendar life of lithium metal batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,6079-6090
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01436G, Paper
Minkwan Kim, Jiwoo An, Seung-Jae Shin, Insu Hwang, Jimin Lee, Youngbin Park, Jinyoung Kim, Eunseok Park, Jisub Kim, Gyuleen Park, Sujin Kim, Ali Coskun, Jang Wook Choi
This study introduces a cutting-edge electrolyte formulation that mitigates Li metal corrosion, significantly extending the calendar life of LMBs. Based on the SEI swelling model, hydrocarbons kinetically block the highly corrosive F-diluent entry.
